subject: Smalltalk was: Re: how to use ExceptionTestCase ?
msgSnippet: ... Smalltalk... :( ;) ... look ... grandaddy ... power). You might be right. I recently had to translate my TDD Java training to Smalltalk for one of our
messageBody:
> > Yes! If only someone would pay me for programming in
Smalltalk... :( ;)
>
> It seems to me making a comeback. Dynamic languages in generally
look
> to be getting more popular.. and of course, Smalltalk is the
grandaddy
> of all dymnamic languages (both in terms of ancestry and sheer
power).

You might be right. I recently had to translate my TDD Java training
to Smalltalk for one of our customers. I'm still waiting for the
second Smalltak training though.

Johannes
